channel.title: Touchstone-3 on naomori's Diary
channel.description: Recent content in Touchstone-3 on naomori's Diary

item.title: 2019-12-09: Touchstone-3 Unit-6 Lesson.B
item.description: Touchstone-3 Unit-6: Managing life Lesson B: Problems and solutions 2. Extra practice (p.145) A.1. I’d prefer not to move out of my apartment. I’d rather not to move out of my apartment. A.2. I should really learn to drive. I’m really going to have to learn to drive. A.3. I should save some money to buy a car. I ought to save some money to buy a car. A.4. I think you should talk to your boss about a promotion.
